title: Mass shootings in the U.S. : legality of shooter 's weapons , as of February 2020
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and a y axis representing Number of incidents.
The highest category is found at Legally_obtained where Number of incidents is 82.0.
The lowest category is found at Some_weapons_were_legally_obtained_others_possibly_illegally where Number of incidents is 1.0.

data.Category Of The Weapon: Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally
